remarks.para: One may be inoperative for associated inoperative bleed system.

numlitem.para: No icing conditions below 5000 ft. AGL at intended destination.

placard.para: Placard near BLEED light located on Bleed Air Supply Module (M10259) on P5 panel "HI PRESS S/O VLV INOP and BLEED LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Notify Flight Dispatch. Flight operations may be affected.
Select affected Bleed Air Switch OFF.
